One last quick post before the weekend - some good news for PHPers. You can now access the API via the Geocoder PHP library if that sort of thing is your cup of tea. If not, you can still us our stand alone PHP library. In both cases the code is open source and pull requests are much appreciated. 

If the idea of a little PHP for the weekend doesn’t excite you fear not, we of course also have libraries for many other languages. 

happy geocoding,

Ed
